jparsec.io.device

Enum ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD>
      • jparsec.io.device.ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD>
    Enclosing class:
    ObservationManager

    public static enum ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD
extends java.lang.Enum<ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD>
    Combination methods for individual flat/dark frames.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      KAPPA_SIGMA
      To combine flats/darks using kappa sigma clipping method.
      MAXIMUM
      To combine flats/darks using the maximum intensity in each pixel.
      MEAN_AVERAGE
      ID constant for combining flats/darks using the mean average.
      MEDIAN
      ID constant for combining flats/darks using the median.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double kappaSigmaValue
      The value of sigma for the kappa sigma method.

    • Method Summary

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • MEDIAN

        public static final ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD MEDIAN
        ID constant for combining flats/darks using the median.

      • MEAN_AVERAGE

        public static final ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD MEAN_AVERAGE
        ID constant for combining flats/darks using the mean average. Median method is better.

      • MAXIMUM

        public static final ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD MAXIMUM
        To combine flats/darks using the maximum intensity in each pixel.

      • KAPPA_SIGMA

        public static final ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD KAPPA_SIGMA
        To combine flats/darks using kappa sigma clipping method.

    • Field Detail

      • kappaSigmaValue

        public static double kappaSigmaValue
        The value of sigma for the kappa sigma method. Default value is 3.
